DOC.brief_summary: This observational , multi-center study evaluate efficacy safety Mircera ( methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta ) renal anemia correction dialyse patient daily clinical practice . Patient receive Mircera accord local summary product characteristic . Data collect 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Mircera Renal Anemia Correction In Dialysed Patients During Daily Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year age Adequate iron status Signed informed consent form Anemia due nonrenal cause Where investigator consider patient unsuitable inclusing reason ( e.g . severe comorbidities active bleeding , infection cancer ) Pregnant lactate female patient Any contraindication treatment Mircera ( accord local Summary Product Characteristics )
